code:
import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import reducer from'./reducer';import mySaga from'./saga';// create the saga middleware
var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();// mount it on the Store
export var store=createStore(reducer,applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));// then run the saga
sagaMiddleware.run(mySaga);
